name: Cuts
description:
This game is meant to be played locally by a group of players on one computer/tablet/smartphone. They must vote their next collective choice and cannot click anywhere until a strict majority consensus is reached.

Made in a week end for the Games for the Many Political Game Jam by:

  • Marcus Bridge @marcus_bridge
  • George Cheal @BonsaiTreehouse
  • Sam Gluck @outlandish 
  • Matteo Menapace @baddeo 
  • Mauro Vanetti @maurovanetti

London, 2-3 December 2017.
